participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and driven, Emily is focused on her goals and values her education highly. She has a positive outlook on life and enjoys social activities.
participant_1.background: my current goal is to run a k. i make straight as in school. i won homecoming queen this year. i'm currently in high school. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and friendly, Jake is laid-back and enjoys hanging out with his friends. He balances work and social life well, even under pressure from family.
participant_2.background: i work took i have a part time job at burger king. i do not drink or do drugs or anything. they're constantly on my back. i just want to have fun with my friends.
